alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Worcester and south central Middlesex Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westborough, or near Shrewsbury, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Framingham, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Hudson, Westborough, Grafton, Sudbury, Ashland, Hopkinton, Northborough, Southborough, Upton, Bolton, Boylston and Berlin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
